titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3916) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on telephone and other communication services.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3916 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. The amendment recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means now printed in the bill shall be considered as adopted. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-637, by Mr. Linder.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 228.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 511.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 201 (Roll no. 229).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 404 - 15 (Roll no. 230).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/23/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3916 (telephone excise tax repeal).
